CustomField.description: This field is used to define a default "Dummy" Asset for a Work Type in case no distinct Asset can be linked to a job. This is used esp. in mobile flows when a new Work Order of ancillary Work Types such as Reinstatement or RARs are created. This is required, as EAM demands an Asset/Compkey in the payload that creates a new Child Work Order.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Dummy Asset to be used for ancillary Work Types
CustomField.label: Default Asset
